thread.title: Abhishek Kapoor: My association with Farhan Akhtar is no more the same
thread.title_full: Abhishek Kapoor: My association with Farhan Akhtar is no more the same

author: CanIndia News Service 1
title: Abhishek Kapoor: My association with Farhan Akhtar is no more the same
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
Mumbai, October 11 (CINEWS):Things have turned astringent between Abhishek Kapoor and Farhan Akhtar over the script’s contention of Rock On 2. speaking to us, Abhishek Kapoor said, “I wouldn’t say that the relationship (with Farhan) is the same. 
It is grievous that this is occurring. I might want to trust that he (Farhan) has been misdirected.” Abhishek has evidently moved the court to slow down the sequel’s making. He was further cited in the report saying, “right now, we are in court. The script I have composed and the makers are not giving me acknowledgment for it. I simply need credit for my script and I don’t know where is the issue. It takes a ton to compose a motion picture and build up a film and when somebody doesn’t give acknowledgment for that, that is bad. It’s a matter of standards.” Related Posts
